BR_text.BRdescription:
In the documentation for DET (<denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen.php?doc=dettutorial.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen.php?doc=dettutorial.html</denchmark-link>
 ) it says:
 
 Note that the logarithm of the density estimates are saved; this allows smaller values to be saved.
 
 While, the actual code is like this:
 <denchmark-code>return std::exp(std::log(ratio) - logVolume)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Which, is essentially equal to ration / Volume, without the logarithm part.
